website_summaries.verdict: With a durable nylon casing and sound quality comparable to some higher end models, this 3.5-millimeter AUX cord offers durability and sound clarity to users on a budget.
pros: Flat nylon casing is more resistant to kinks than most rubber-coated cables, meaning this cord can stand up to a lot of use
Podcasts and music both come through surprisingly clear, with a quality users might expect from more expensive cables
Gold-plated connectors resist wear, and the standard 10-foot length meets the needs of most users
cons: This model tends to make crackling and static sounds when not actively in use

customer_reviews.title: Quality cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with intentions of feeding into the mic input on my PC so i can record my piano pieces onto my computer cleanly. I was surprised at the quality of this, from the nice boxed packaging to the cable itself which is that braided metal kind of feel/look. Everything about this looks high quality, and the results of my recording sounds great too (although to be fair, i'm not really sure what constitutes as amazing quality vs average). the cable is plenty long for what i need it for, and with the construction, there is absolutely no tangling. I'm really loving this, one of the best extension cable (of any kind) i have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Crackles until it receives input
customer_reviews.text: This thing crackles A LOT when not actively in use.. like if you pause a song or close an app and it's still plugged into your phone and car. But the second I start playing audio, the crackling goes away and it works great. My old one was silent when audio was paused (but the cord was too short), with the same phone in the same car. So it's definitely a default of this cord, but it's still serving it's purpose perfectly and the long cord is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Shawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great cables for the price. I accidentally closed it in the door. No problem. The non-kink cable saved it. I like the way the cable is attached to the plugs. Not flimsy like the others I've used. This is where they usually go bad but I don't see that happening with these. Will update after a while of drunken partying use and abuse. That old brick and mortar electronics store would have been double the price for these. Update: The cord made it thru a party of abuse. It got stepped on, closed in screen door, ankle wrappped and thwacked the phone that was plugged in and still survived without a scratch or kink. Passed the stress test...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cable failed after 7 months of occasional light use - seller did not honor their warantee
customer_reviews.text: This cable worked fine at first. But after about 7 months it failed. It produces a very loud hum whenever an audio signal is not playing through it, even though securely fastened to headphone jack and amplified speakers or an instrument amp. I tested it with different devices and the problem happens; no problem with other cables I own and tried. Seller ignored my request for a refund, even though the cable was supposed to be waranteed for 18 months. Suggest never buying a product from them; I won't.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewS

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: This was replacement cord for child's headset to a Fire HD8 tablet. Same size as original cord. Description said for headsets, tablets, etc. Works with child's headphones to cell phones, but does not work with/when connect to tablet (no sound). Fits in table opening properly, but no sound come thru. Tested tablet with another child headphones with same size cord (works) -- so it is not the tablet or headphones, it is your cable connection to the tablet not working. Didn't cost enough for trouble to send back. Do not purchase for Fire HD8 tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Scrib

customer_reviews.title: Cable failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Sound only outputs to one channel now which is just my right ear on my headphones. The cable states it comes with an 18 month warranty and after emailing the company twice and giving them a week to respond, I have yet to hear anything. I use this cable every day in an office setting, and it never leaves my desk. With that being said, the cable IS used daily but not in an aggressive manner... I will gladly change my review if the company ever decides to write me back and warranty the product like they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is really good crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: Today, we will look at the build quality,and the quality of sound that is dispersed though this product, lastly we will discuss my setup. Firstly, this aux cable is well insulated and definitely has gold planted male ends. Secondly, the sound quality is really good crystal clear. Lastly, my setup, moreover I bought this product for my 2.1 Klipsch Pro media THX certified speakers. I highly recommend these speakers they are awesome and arec great for movies and music. The cable is used for a extension from the aux cable of the 2.1 speakers, setup. In conclusion this cord does what designed to do. God bless you✝️
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for cat chewed Phil Jones Bass
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for that unobtanium Phil Jones Bass headphone cord. You know the one...the $99 set of headphones with removable, 'screw in' cord that even the manufacturer doesn't stock? Yeah, that one. It's a very snug fit, and it's a major PITA to pull out, so buy 2 if you want to use it for something else. Perfect snug fit for something the cat might have lost it's life chewing on. *(No, the cat didn't lose it's life, but it's no longer an inside cat as it went through about 6 sets of headphone and earbud cords, several stereo cords and one power cable. It ate the power cable last...and hasn't eaten any cords since. Wonder why ;-) )
customer_reviews.author: millerized

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: After the 2nd use the cover between the metal part and the cord came off. Still works, but if that doesnt need to be there, why put it there? Also, unplugged the cord from my stereo and apparently plugged it back in the other way and it didn't work... Took some messing around with it to realize I needed switch it back around and that it wouldn't work both ways.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Aux Cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wireless headphones because I am a lazy soul who doesn't like needing to recharge things all the time. The cord is very well built and sturdy, and that's a definite plus because I have cats who like to chew on cords. I can't tell you how many headphones have been unwillingly sacrificed to the alter of the cat gods. But in all seriousness, this is a durable product that works exactly as I want it to, and I have no complaints. I use it just about every day, and it's still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Best audio cord I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the length and it came in and immediately you know it's going to last a really long time. I use it on my headphones that have a plug for this cord. The material is like that shoelace wrapping type stuff but it's really strong and durable. Also in the past I notice the gold plated plugs outlast the silver plugs buy a long shot. This product has the gold plated plugs. I am very pleased with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the long length and the tangle-resistant woven covering.
customer_reviews.text: This long cable is perfect for when my bluetooth headphones die, and I need to plug them into my laptop while I'm working. Shorter cords get pulled on when I lean over to grab something while I'm working, but this cord prevents that. I often keep it half-coiled and tied off, so that I'm only using about 5-6 feet of it, but there's really no worry of tangling. The outer woven covering seems to prevent that. I love it. I got a similar cord for plugging in my iPhone, and I love them both.
customer_reviews.author: DesertBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work :(
customer_reviews.text: Cable didn’t work at all - right out of the box. I tried a different cable to make sure it wasn’t my device that was the problem and the other cable transferred the sound perfectly. So then I tried using this one with two other devices and still nothing. I’m guessing I got a faulty cable, maybe it’s just mine or maybe it’s not?
customer_reviews.author: Loving momma!

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy; isn't.  Didn't last 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This cord *feels* really well made. I was sure it was gonna hold up well. It FEELS really well made. But here I am, 2.5 months in of LIGHT use— I only use it at my desktop, rarely plug or unplug it— and it's already dying on me. I gave it 2 stars because at least it was cheap? Still, I expected more than 2.5 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: nom de plume

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CONNECTING CABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the male/male cord from my mini speaker to my cell phone because of the crackling sound. I've never gotten into bluetooth because I use my cell for entertainment mostly, and that includes playing it to lull me to sleep at bedtime with Amazon movies. Probably was a very inferior cord just sent with the speaker, then left it up to customers to replace in time. The cord is so interwoven with what seems like black fiberglass (it's not), like a very tightly wound tiny electrical cord that's fireproof or electric-shock proof. The sound when I connected the speaker to my cell phone using the new cord was FANTASTIC! Unfortunately - MADE IN CHINA. BUY AMERICAN!
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels great, didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail... "stereo" audio cable only has sound in the left ear, and that is choppy at best. overall the feel and look of the cable is snazzy, unfortunately they didn't work. I will be asking for a replacement. EDIT: OK the cable is fine, its just a slightly larger diameter than the intake of the Sony M3 so the connection wasn't perfect. Took the cable down to my belt sander and shaved a tiny amount off the diameter of the cable cover. fits nice and tight now, and perfect sounding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super long and sturdy cable.
customer_reviews.text: Super long and sturdy cable. I bought this to power my car phone charger and have it run around my seat under the carpet and to the left vent where my charger is located. My phone charges there in the cradle for ease and comfort. I did have to use my tiny aux converter because my Mophie juice pack hole was too small for this end. But it was free with my mophie case so that was no problem. This setup allows me to cradle and charge at the same time without having to plug in my phone...it just sits in the cradle and charges.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: falls short in durability
customer_reviews.text: had 3 and all dont work now, initially they produce good sound quality and value but lack real durability as excessive bending results audio distortion, all failed in 6 months from decent use, but for the price i dont mind, its like an apple charger, nice and good looking but it breaks after a little bit, no choice but to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable
customer_reviews.text: We love this little cable so far, but we haven't had it very long. It seems very durable and love the length. Our last one was too long and got in the way all the time. This is just long enough to reach where we need it to be, but not long enough to be in the way. The sound is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: BestsontheroadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Connection issue on my VMODA headphones
customer_reviews.text: The cable and tips seem pretty high quality, but unfortunately the tip inserts just a little too far into my headphones so it doesn't get a good connection. If I pull the connector out slightly I get sound in both ears. I'm thinking I'll be able to fix this by putting a tiny silicone washer on the connector. Without this connection issue I would have given this a 4, maybe 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: snike3

customer_reviews.title: I had to return mine wasn't long enough
customer_reviews.text: the cable is good but kind of cheap but better than the stuff I grew up with. It's not long enough for my computer to my stereo, I unplug it and it shoots off my cp desk. I was going to tape it but it just reaches and then I can't vacuum that area because the cable is hanging. It worked fine and isn't junk is what I guess I should be saying. I would buy again but maybe a 15' cable instead.
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: IT BROKE - *immediately* upon first use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable for my headphones to take on an overseas flight. As soon as I plugged it into the armrest, it managed to snap...the brass/metal bit...completely snapped off!!! I didn't get the chance to listen to anything with it...DON'T BUY THIS CABLE...it's rubbish!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for a long time and finally decided to try to buy it, but after receiving it, value for money,it was beyond my expectation that this thermometer is very easy to operate, only two buttons, and the backlight in the screen will change in different temperature ranges, the screen is also very large and the data is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lii Zhu

customer_reviews.title: They are okay I suppose.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is my speakers but a lot of static. I am using this to connect between my laptop and an external Bluetooth where the Bluetooth doesn't connect very well. I figured this would be a cheap solution. Both the laptop and speaker are on my desk. When the desk move the sound is interrupted.
customer_reviews.author: SK90211

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cable scrape!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this cable is fine. My problem is the material the cable part is made of. It's not smooth. So every time I moved my body the cable would drag across my clothes, the arm of my chair or whatever, and I could feel and hear the scraping vibration through my headphones. Scrape, scrape, scrape. It's kind of annoying after awhile. Finally, I just went looking for a model with a smoother cable, which I did find and I am now enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Relativity

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I got these in Augustvand already they can't connect on either end to allow audio. It cuts out and unless you can hold both ends directly into the port of your device and headphones, you wont hear a thing. I can't even believe it. Not even a half a year and its junk.
customer_reviews.author: Winship

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She hasn't uttered a single complaint so I'm sure they're a winner. She put them right to work for her and easily plugged them into her Beats. She uses them daily so...if there had been a problem, I'd have know about it. Well made, durable, just what she asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly; good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement cable to listen to my laptop and iPad via headphones. My old cable would cut out and I had to hold it as a certain angle to get stereo sound. I love this long cable and it works perfectly with my equipment. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good MP3 cables and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really loving these MP3 cables I bought to use with the new earphones I purchased. I wanted long ones because I use my Kindle Fire to listen to music while soaking in the hot tub. These are perfect and good quality unlike some of the cheaper sets I have purchased at Wal Mart. These are more flexible and are well made. They should last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Teach

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this would fit, but it did. We are using it to plug our cell phones into a dream machine to play our own music through outta speaker and can also plug my Sirius XM antenna radio into it as well. Very handy to connect with this cord.. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great cable. Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice cable. It feels strong and as far as cables go, it looks nice. I use it in my car to connect my phone audio to the cars speakers. Now we can listen to my podcasts, music or navigation instructions through the cars speakers at a volume that everyone in the car can hear.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the very LAST cord of it's kind you will ever need to buy. It feels almost like braided nylon or kevlar. My only hope is that the plugs last as long as the cord does. Time will tell. Great purchase and I highly recommend this to anyone who replaces theirs more often than they would like to and to those who are rough with their equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Ate My Kinps AUX Cable, so I Bought Two More
customer_reviews.text: Great quality AUX cable. I bought this to replace the one I lost for my Samsung Level On PRO headphones, and I've been extremely pleased with these. I wasn't expecting much, but I have to say I ended up being impressed with them, even though they're just AUX cables. I bought two more after my dog chewed through my original Kinps AUX cable.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Two Great Stereo Cords!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two stereo to stereo cords, so I can record from two stereo voice recorders. One I recorded left and right, the other I recorded right to left. I also ordered a stereo plug splitter, as to using both stereo cords with. I connected the splitter into the AUX in of my CD-R unit. I tried to make a "surround sound" recording. It came out quite well!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Howard Duran

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Losing connection in the left ear after 2 months of gentle use. Can’t find the sellers contact info to ask for a warranty exchange. The cable jacket is very ‘wiry’ and noisy, not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Migliore

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my PS4/Astro mixamp stream setup
customer_reviews.text: The cable itself is nice. Long 10ft cable with a nice braid. I'm using this in my Astro mixamp 2019 model plugged into its stream port running into the line-in port in my computer so I can capture party chat audio on PS4 as part of my stream setup. Great cable. A+
customer_reviews.author: DC857

customer_reviews.title: Quality cable; not shielded well for low volume
customer_reviews.text: I have had some of these cables for quite a while. The cable quality seems fine. The are very flexible and seem sturdy. They work well with my Bose speakers on my computer. However, when I plug in my headphones, I can hear a LOT of noise being picked by the cables even with no source on the other end. I don't get any of that noise when I plug in the cable that came with the speakers. I will be looking for cables with better shielding.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great Wire
customer_reviews.text: The wire arrived today and I used it to replace another one that started to cut out on the left channel. This installed without issue and works perfectly. I may be imagining it, but I think the speakers actually sound better now. Build quality is good and came in at the right length.
customer_reviews.author: JonoVonOno

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, nice packaging, but very thin cable design. Durability TBD
customer_reviews.text: So far, the cable works great. I'm docking one star due to the VERY thin cable construction. I don't get a feeling that it will be durable, nor resist kinking all that well. Time will tell. I use this particular cable in our family van so that kids can take turn plugging their devices so that we can all be "fair" in terms of who decides what music we are all subjected to. :)
customer_reviews.author: Vivman

customer_reviews.title: Trash.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate the material the cord is made of because every chance it gets it will coil around on itself in multiple places and because of that you have to unravel it each day until it decides to short out at one of the points it likes to kink into.
customer_reviews.author: Zack B.

customer_reviews.title: Super long cable and works fine at first but can have issues later
customer_reviews.text: Super long cable and works fine. I'll update this review in a few months time to see if it lasts. UPDATE: this cord has lasted and it still works perfect! UPDATE AGAIN: this is now a year later and honestly the cord made a scratchy sound to the audio after about 6 months. I end up throwing it away. It was a bummer. I’d suggest buying a smaller one or not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Koga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Strong and durable, works with ipad mini echo dot and my many external sound car.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked wonderfully, of all the product i had purchased this was the only one that connected to my ipad mini to my pc which mixes all my other devices without static and white noise. I also use it for my Amazon alexa echo dot and it works wonders. the cord is strong and resistant to getting cut which is great since i use a lot of heavy duty twist ties and plastic ties
customer_reviews.author: michael tran

customer_reviews.title: Solid cable for a solid price
customer_reviews.text: Solid cables. The braided cable feels very sturdy. I got the 10 foot cable and love it. The ends feel of a high quality build. I bought this cable for a 12-hour road trip for a pair of headphones that have a removable cable and they have upheld very very well. I have not had any issues with sound; and the sound comes through very clear. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good audio cable of this type.
customer_reviews.author: guitarandvideogames.tech

customer_reviews.title: I wish the cable be more flexible
customer_reviews.text: This cable replaced the original from my wife's favorite headphones. This one is more sturdy, but also not as flexible as the original one. This is not a big deal, but it makes the cable a little more difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This cord looks good and sturdy, good quality, I think it will last a long time. The sound quality meets my expectations. The first cord I received wasn’t working for whatever reason so I contacted the seller. They responded to my message quickly and sent out a replacement right away, at no cost, without any hassle. The replacement arrived in just a few days and works perfectly. Great product with excellent customer service, highly recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: KT D

customer_reviews.title: Meh, nope.
customer_reviews.text: Audio anolamies. High pitched pops and squeeling with nothing else going on. Switched back to the stock cable. And the problems disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cables for Auxiliary speakers.
customer_reviews.text: As all of you know, television speakers are not the best. I have an Altec radio/media player that I wanted to use as an external speaker but didn't have the cables with the correct connectors. This cable is perfect. The sound I get is great and I don't have to buy more speakers that would have been considerably more money. The price is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent audio cord. It's well constructed, apparently durable, attractive to the eye--and, most important, provides high quality sound. I use it in my office, connecting a computer to a Bose speaker, and it's working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James Strock

customer_reviews.title: Broke it
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for the short time I had them, up until recently when something went wrong inside of them. Now every time I move even slightly, the sound quality changes greatly, which is annoying as I have to try and move everything into an awkward position just to try and hear out of both headphones. I'm pretty sure this is my own fault, as I've accidentally tripped over or caught the cable on things so often that the plugs were getting yanked out repeatedly. I'm realizing now that maybe ten feet of headphone cable was a bit excessive.
customer_reviews.author: tomsketchit

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the cable. One of the reasons I purchased it was so I could lesson to thing on my computer and still work in my station. It is long enough for me to reach everything I need to without having to take off my headphones. I am very please with the quality as well. The cable is flexible and does not get tangled.
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: This was a great upgrade over the stock cable
customer_reviews.text: Got it a few days ago to replace the cable on my Philips SHP9500s headphones. This was a great upgrade over the stock cable. The cable is very manageable and even works out well with my modmic and the brackets and cable wrapper that comes with it. I can't attest to the durability yet since I've only had it a few days but will update if I have any issues. Seems like a great value so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Strong, straight, works great next to high interference lines.
customer_reviews.text: Eliminated all connection issues and feedback. Eliminated crosstalk from laying next to high power lines. This fixed all my audio fidelity issues in one very nice package. The covering allows the wire to run straight as an arrow, no kinks or bends from shipping. Its very easy to work with and fish though tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: GuyFrom-a-FlatState

customer_reviews.title: Made poorly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few of these over the years and they’ve always broken after around 8 months. They lose either the left or the right audio channel because it’s made poorly. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bicycle

customer_reviews.title: but the finer details will leave you wishing you would've paid a ...
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for about 5 minutes. After that, the protective sleeve came right off and now just slides up and down. The cord seems well made, but the finer details will leave you wishing you would've paid a little more for a better product that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I used to to patch my PC audio out to my Zoom H1 digital recorder to record some audio that was in a proprietary format. The audio was court-specific FTR audio and I needed to send a few minutes of it to someone who wasn't technically capable of installing the FTR software. ... Worked great. Headphone out to line in stereo did the job exactly as I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: six

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small diameter plugs fit Skullcandy headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, can move pretty far from my computer without having to take off my headphones. About half of the cables out there do not fit into my headphones, these do. The braided metal on the cables will make them very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice aux cable
customer_reviews.text: Use this for a computer audio setup and it works great. The braided cable is a nice feature as they stay clean and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great with computer in speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speaker that goes to my bed from my computer when I listen to my classical and opera Music thank you very much Amazon for this Cable is made out of a excellent material is not rubber hey synthetic nylon for material
customer_reviews.author: W. M. TYLER

customer_reviews.title: allows electrical interference and a terrible 60Hz hum because it is not adequately shielded
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shielded audio cable. This cable, while attractive and well made, allows electrical interference and a terrible 60Hz hum because it is not adequately shielded. That makes it useless for my purposes. I returned it and purchased the KableDirekt equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: April R

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: The base wore out quickly and I could not hear in one ear of my headphones. The base is also too wide for some headphone receptor plugs.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, using it to move my pc ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, using it to move my pc set up further out and in a more organized method. This wire got the job done and is alot higher grade than logitech
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Quality cable
customer_reviews.text: The cable arrived on time is as advertised. The connections on both ends are slim which works well for plugging into narrow ports. The construction of the cable seems quite durable especially as it is braided. I am happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mouttet

customer_reviews.title: Performed as hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promisied in good condition. Works as expected. I recommend purchase to anyone needing such an audio cable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Nice 3.5mm Audio Cable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cable for connecting my Desktop computer to an external Amplifier/Speakers. They are well made and have very good audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Simple Cable.  Though, I would pay more for a different sleeving.  Most won't mind though I'm sure.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cable, no complaints. It's not a cloth fabric sleeve, but some type of plastic woven sleeve. For the price, you can't go wrong. I'd say if you are needing a cable for general connections to aux/car/systems it will work fantastic. For a main headphone cable it's not a bad choice, though I personally prefer a cloth sleeve or a more bendable type of rubber instead of the woven plastic style this has. It's also very thin which is great for wiring things up. Not much else to say I guess, overall happy with purchase but again for an audiophile you might want to look at higher end products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This work great
customer_reviews.text: Working from home these days with all those Zoom calls. This cord really helps now I can hook it up to my laptop to my JBL speaker. Thank you all for you replies to my questions : )
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Chevannes

customer_reviews.title: Quality cable
customer_reviews.text: Well made. No sonic distortion noted. Used to connect cassette play headphone jack to computer sound card line-in for recording tape to wav files.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my car since I do not have bluetooth capability. Works great, and cord is of sufficient length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Lines, Built To Last A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stand, a great addition to making my iPad mobile. I use the bluetooth in my iPad to connect with my bluetooth mobile speaks that I move from room to room or outdoors. I would recommend this to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I had a cord previously that would constantly get stuck under the wheels of my office chair and finally was chewed up enough that the signal wouldn't go through unless you held it at a specific angle. This cord is thicker, tough, and made with solid materials. Very utilitarian. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cable seems to be good quality I would buy another one just like this if I needed it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cable seems to be good quality I would buy another one just like this if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: BHR

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made cable
customer_reviews.text: Really well made cable. Great for using my Kindle through the car stereo. Going to look to see if Kinps sells cables for charging cell phones because this cable is flexible and very strong. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gold-plated braided premium audio cable 3.5mm plug-in.
customer_reviews.text: The better alternative to blue-tooth enabled headphones for private audio and eavesdropping. This 10 foot braided audio cable with a 3.5mm gold plated plug fits most devices. From KINPS, delivered ahead of schedule with a free included 12 month warranty. Excellent quality product and customer service
customer_reviews.author: Whovian Raj

customer_reviews.title: Good for hooking external audio source to an amp
customer_reviews.text: Good for hooking an ipad or such to a guitar amp. Using it for that for my kid to play along. Nothing like hearing your kid play Ozzy loud, like 35 years after you listened to Crazy Train for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: suaspontemark

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cable.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy cable. It's about 10 ft long. The outside sheath is made of a harder plastic fibrous material instead of the cheaper plastic kind.The ends are robust. Been using it for a few weeks now. If it messes up I will update the review but for now seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The cable is not shielded so it operates as a giant antenna picking up noise and hum. Go with a shielded cable if you value your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G

customer_reviews.title: Appears very good quality works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it long but the cord seems to be of much stronger material than the original one that came with my Bose speaker. It works great...I’m trying to reduce EMF and Bluetooth and such so I use hardwired whenever I can (plug my iPhone into my Bose with this). Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cable - Will Last Longer Than Standard Rubber Insulation
customer_reviews.text: Here's a trick... Find an inexpensive, 2.1 soundbar for your new, smart TV, that has a 3.5mm mic jack input. Then buy this wire, and run it from the TV's headphones output to the soundbar. This will allow for zero changes to be made for volume control to easily remain the same through both the TV and cable-box remotes.
customer_reviews.author: MTDebbie

customer_reviews.title: Very quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son so I can't say how well they work but they came in less than 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Gloriana

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Cable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cable is very strong and is hard to get tangled, unlike other cables. The sound quality is very high and sounds great even with the volume on full. I've had this cable for a pretty long time now and it has had lots of use and I have not had any problems with it>
customer_reviews.author: Evan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few weeks. Now it shorts out after about 20 minutes. Seems like the wires are thin and weak at the plug in point. Sounded good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for speaker sound bar for my PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my PC sound bar as the one I had was too short. Works perfect and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diggs

customer_reviews.title: So far, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the short cord that came with my headphones. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Tough Braided Nylon cable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality audio cable. Use it for my desktop headphones. They nylon-braded cable will keep me from destroying it by running it over with my desk chair like my last one. And the 18 month free warranty should help me out if it does! Does what it advertises: is a 3.5mm male to male stereo Aux Cord.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound transfer!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous cable for audio transfer from one music device to another!
customer_reviews.author: mimscase

customer_reviews.title: Work great for about 2 weeks then starts to crackle..I have been through 4 now
customer_reviews.text: They start out working great..buy them because they of the brands they are compatible with. I thought the first one went bad because of a fluke. The second was disappointing but now have to find another supplier since after 4 orders they still don't last past a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and super quick ship
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and super quick ship. The cord itself is not the usual plastic type it is more like a protective metal coating on the outside which is awesome as we are using this on our front porch. While the cord is very protective it is still flexible at the same time
customer_reviews.author: michelle gomillion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cable, the jacket is strong, light weight, and very flexible. Also the connectors are slim so they fit into tight spaces where a bulkier cable would not if there was something also bulky plugged in beside it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Neiderhiser

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cord with an end small enough to fit in phone without removing my case. This works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Durable and hard to tangle. Probably my favorite aftermarket cable so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and definitely long enough. Cable does not tangle without wrestling with it and it feels very durable. The color is subdued which is nice and the end connectors are very slim so there shouldn't be a problem plugging it into smaller openings or phones with cases.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Stop hesitating and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty hard on these cords. These have lasted the longest out of any brand I have bought. Still haven't broken one!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This thing stopped working after a month and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing stopped working after a month and a half. I can't believe it. Light usage (about once a week) and its already broken.... and now I can't return it because its been just over the 30 day limit. Really ridiculous.....
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: No more crawling under desk to use headphone with computer
customer_reviews.text: This product is great - I can now plug my headphones in without crawling under my desk to get to the computer tower (at work). I have Marshall headphones and the cord removes at the headphones to allow plug in to either side.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for headphones with a mic
customer_reviews.text: I bought them specifically for a set of headphones with a mic. The information on the product made it sound like they should work with them but they do not.
customer_reviews.author: Arcaderat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cable. It is a long cable suitable for many uses. It is well built and tough it will be hard to break. I use it for headphones and it is the best one I have had with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schukei

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly only thing is if you have a case ...
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly only thing is if you have a case it may not allow you to fully insert it causing static sounds. But it really depends on your case size, mine is very thick thats why I have to remove the bottom of it when using the aux doesn't bother me because I don't have to remove my whole case.
customer_reviews.author: Amaguana’s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for his head phones
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my son's headphones. They have a narrow plug and some are to wide to fit in the plug but these work. The cord is long enough he has some movement.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cable exactly met my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cable to connect between my inexpensive sound bar and my TV. The quality of this cable appears good, and the length worked well for my situation. Sound quality is good, and this cable met my needs exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Local Man

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could just leave a 5-Star review without writing a novel to go along with it. I like it. It's good. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: LJRossPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I love these cables. As opposed to standard cord construction, these have a nice braided mesh that feels rugged and tuff for a tiny diameter which is par for anything that is 3.5mm. I use these for headphones replacement cord and they worked out perfect and feel very secure
customer_reviews.author: Lowell t. Siwundhla

product_meta.title: KINPS Audio Auxiliary Stereo Audio Cable 3.5mm Stereo Jack Male to Male, Stereo Jack Cord for Phones, Headphones, Speakers, Tablets, PCs, MP3 Players and More (10FT/ 3M, Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:10FT/ 3M, Black Procuct Description 

Tangle-Free Design Connect your iPod or iPhone to your car stereo, home stereo, portable speakers, sound card or any device that has a 3.5mm aux port. 

Incredibly Durable 

We bent this cable over 10000 times and saw no damage or change in performance. Premium metal housing makes it extra durable. 

Cable Features 

Gold-Plated Bevelled Connectors 
Nylon Cable 
Resistant against corrosion 

Compatible With: 

* iPhone, iPod, iPad, other smartphones, tablets, laptops, MP3 players, Walkman, Headphones, Speakers and all other audio-playing devices with a 3.5mm aux port. 
* Beats and other brands of headphone, Hi-Fi stereo sound systems, car stereos, radios, portable bluetooth speakers and wireless audio receivers with a 3.5mm aux port. 

Warranty：18 months 

If there have any question about your item, please feel free to contact us! 

Package Includes: 

1 x KINPS 10FT Auxiliary Audio Cable
feature_bullets: Play Audio from any Phones, Tablets, MP3, TV Boxes, DVD, PCs, Laptops, Consoles or other media- playing device on your Headphones, Speakers, Home Entertainment System or Car Stereo System (Aux Port) (fits all standard 3.5mm aux ports).

No attenuation of sound quality. Maintaining audio level. Passes test and detection for each single product (Tests including but not limited: Stereo, Left/Right Channel, Microphone, Signal Level, Short-Circuit).

Hi-Fi Performance: 24K gold-plated connectors ensure the cleanest sound. Represents originally every Musical Note and Beat. Frequency Response 20 Hz-20 KHz. 0.01% Distortion. High Signal-To-Noise Ratio. Transmitting FULL power from input to output.

Compatible for Headphones, iOS devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod), Android devices (Samsung, LG, Nexus, Sony etc), PCs, Laptops, Macbook, iMac, MP3 Players, cars, TV, DVD, TV box. All with 3.5mm audio aux stereo jack.
What you get: 1*KINPS 10FT Auxiliary Audio Cable, 18 months warranty. Should you have any concerns to the problem, feel free to contact us.
